*the pod starts scanning for lifeforms... It finds an eagle and a lion*

*Rexon pants as he runs towards the pod, keeping the direction it set in his 
sight. He was going to reach it.. soon, maybe in a few minutes (can't 
remember the BW word for it!). The Wolf in him helped kept him running, but 
the Fox was not adapted for running such a distance. His toungue was lolling 
out*

*Finally he reaches the pod, and sees the DNA scanner just go down. He goes 
to Robot Mode, his first time, and waits for the new Protoform to come out*

*The pod opens and under a dense fog something flshes out of the pod when 
looking up Rexon is blinded by the light for a second and sees a Griphon 
land in front of Him*

"Free at last!"the griphon says..."Damn it felt cold in that chamber..."

Griffter
